title: Kick-off
description: West Brom get the match underway

title: Yellow card
description: McAuley is booked for a foul on Agbonlahor

title: Red card
description: Kieran Richardson has been sent off for lunging in on Sessegnon after he lost control of the ball

title: Yellow card
description: Tom Cleverley is booked for a foul.

title: Half-time
description: The first half ends with no score

title: Substitution
description: Second half is underway with Villa making a change. Fabian Delph who is returning from injury is on for NZogbia

title: Yellow card
description: Pocognoli has been booked for simulation

title: Yellow card
description: Alan Hutton is booked for a foul on Pocognoli

title: Substitution
description: Berahino is on in place of Dorrans

title: Goal!
description: Deadlock finally broken as Craig Cardner fires home the rebound after a scramble in the box

title: Substitution
description: Double change for Villa as Vlaar and Weimann replace Sanchez and Cissokho

title: Full-time
description: Much needed win for the Baggies in the Midlands derby against Villa
